room_title: Escape room "Pirate's Treasure Room" by Escapomania in Ocean City
review: My family and I did the Treasure Island room we really enjoyed it and had a great time would have been better if the staff wasn't so quick to give us clues when we did not ask for them finished the puzzle in 25 minutes.

room_title: Escape room "Pirate's Treasure Room" by Escapomania in Ocean City
review: Did the Pirate themed room. Took us a while to get started once we found the first clue had tons of fun. Got out with just a couple of minutes left.The staff was very friendly and helpful when we got stuck. I will definitely go back.

room_title: Escape room "Pirate's Treasure Room" by Escapomania in Ocean City
review: We have done a lot of escape rooms. My husband and I did the Pirate room at the Uptown location and it was a lot of fun! However, even though it was just the two of us, we got out in less than 30 minutes. The staff mentioned the Sherlock room is harder, maybe we’ll try that next time. Probably a great starter room but didn’t exactly feel like we got our money’s worth.

room_title: Escape room "Pirate's Treasure Room" by Escapomania in Ocean City
review: Had a great time solving the treasure room. I highly recommend this.

room_title: Escape room "Pirate's Treasure Room" by Escapomania in Ocean City
review: OMG... The guy must have felt sorry for us! We were so clueless. Eventually we solved the mystery and did get out....15 minutes extra. Five moms on a break had a blast the entire time!
